chapter.text: 73|1|he chaadar odhane vaale
73|2|khade raho (namaaz mein) raatri ke samay, parantu kuchh[1] samay.
73|3|(arthaat) aadhee raat athava usase kuchh kam.
73|4|ya usase kuchh adhik aur padho quraan ruk-ruk kar.
73|5|ham utaarenge (he nabee!) aap par ek bhaaree baat (quraan).
73|6|vaastav mein, raat mein jo ibaadat hotee hai, vah adhik prabhaavee hai (man ko) ekaagr karane mein tatha adhik uchit hai baat praarthana ke lie.
73|7|aapake lie din mein bahut-se kaary hain.
73|8|aur smaran (yaad) karen apane paalanahaar ke naam kee aur sabase alag hokar usee ke ho jaayen.
73|9|vah poorv tatha pashchim ka paalanahaar hai. nahin hai koee poojy (vandaneey) usake siva, atah, usee ko apana karata-dharata bana len.
73|10|aur sahan karen un baaton ko, jo ve bana rahe hain[1] aur alag ho jaayen unase susheelata ke saath.
73|11|tatha chhod den mujhe tatha jhuthalaane vaale sukhee (sampann) logon ko aur unhen avasar den kuchh der.
73|12|vastutah, hamaare paas (unake lie) bahut-see bediyaan tatha dahakatee agni hai.
73|13|aur bhojan, jo gale mein phans jaaye aur duhkhadaayee yaatana hai.
73|14|jis din kaanpegee dharatee aur parvat tatha ho jaayenge parvat, bhurabhure ret ke dher.
73|15|hamane bheja hai tumhaaree or ek rasool[1] tumapar gavaah (saakshee) banaakar, jaise firaun kee or ek rasool (moosa) ko.
73|16|to avagya kee firaun ne us rasool kee aur hamane pakad liya use kadee pakad.
73|17|to kaise bachoge, yadi kufr kiya tumane us din se, jo bana dega bachchon ko (shok ke kaaran) boodha
73|18|aakaash phat jaayega us din. usaka vachan poora hokar rahega.
73|19|vaastav mein, ye (aayaten) ek shiksha hain. to jo chaahe, apane paalanahaar kee or raah bana le.

73|20|nihsandeh, aapaka paalanahaar jaanata hai ki aap khade hote hain (tahujjud kee namaaz ke lie) do tihaee raatri ke lag-bhag tatha aadhee raat aur tihaee raat tatha ek samooh un logon ka, jo aapake saath hain aur allaah hee haî€¼isaab rakhata hai raat tatha din ka. vah jaanata hai ki tum pooree raat namaaz ke lie khade nahin ho sakoge, atah, usane daya kar dee tumapar. to padho jitana saral ho quraan mein se.[1] vah jaanata hai ki tumamen kuchh rogee honge aur kuchh dusare yaatra karenge dharatee mein khoj karate hue allaah ke anugrah (jeevika) kee aur kuchh doosare yudhd karenge allaah kee raah mein, atah, padho jitana saral ho usamen se tatha sthaapana karo namaaz kee, zakaat dete raho aur rn do allaah ko achchha rn[2] tatha jo bhee aage bhejoge bhalaee mein se, to use allaah ke paas paoge. vahee uttam aur usaka bahut bada pratiphal hoga aur kshama maangate raho allaah se, vaastav mein vah ati kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai.
